Payment Info

Credit card payment is for the 1st month's MRC and the NRC (for Month-to-Month Contracts) and the 1st two months' MRC (for 12 Month Contracts)(the “Initial Payment”). Customers choosing to pay by invoice shall be sent an invoice to their registered billing email address. For non-credit approved customers choosing to make the Initial Payment by invoice, the 15 day (or 30 day for 100 Gig) service delivery interval shall start as of the date of receipt by the provider of the Initial Payment.
